oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: C-GLYCOSIDIC ELICITORS

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Formation of three diasteroisomeric spirodilactones 14a--c and 11 has been reported from diester 13 and 9, respectively, under the influence of mineral acid. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
